message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs. Given its high value and quality, it's worth $150 to you. Considering its exceptional features and benefits, I would like to propose an offer of $140 for this product. This price not only allows us to maintain a fair profit margin but also presents you with an excellent opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a reasonable discount. I believe this deal would be mutually beneficial. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding.
